description: A massive carnivorous plant that serves as the gate guardian of Floor 10 in the Echoing Grotto. Its writhing vines and snapping maw hunger for flesh.

name: Vaskor, the Stone Maw
senses: Darkvision 60 ft., Tremorsense 120 ft., passive Perception 11
description: A colossal earth elemental with a gaping stone maw, guardian of Floor 20 in the Heart of the Verdant Wild. Its body is composed of living rock and jungle stone.

name: Ashthirst the Hollow
description: A hollow specter of ash and wind, guardian of Floor 30 in the Fields of Whispering Grasses. It thirsts for the life force of the living.

name: Choralith, Voice Below
description: An otherworldly entity that speaks in harmonious yet terrifying voices, guardian of Floor 40 in the Sepulcher of Silent Thrones.

name: Lumen of the Shattered Thread
description: A radiant being of pure elemental energy, guardian of Floor 50 in the Convergence of the Four Winds. Its form shifts between the four elements.

name: Threxus, the Iron Spiral
description: A massive construct of spiraling iron and radiant energy, guardian of Floor 60 in the Halls of Radiant Dawn. Its form constantly shifts in geometric patterns.

name: Eirfax, the Dusk Crowned
description: A twilight fey lord crowned with dusk itself, guardian of Floor 70 in the Spiral Nexus of Infinite Echoes. Reality bends around its presence.

name: Xarog, the Pactbound Furnace
description: A massive fiend bound by ancient pacts, guardian of Floor 80 in the Chorus of the First Choir. Its body burns with infernal flames.

name: Gor Vekk, Architect of Ends
description: An ancient aberration that designs the end of realities, guardian of Floor 90 in the Veiled Expanse. Its very presence warps space and time.

name: The Marquis of Silence
zoneFound: Abyssal Court of the Demonic Throne
description: The ultimate guardian of Floor 100, a demon lord of unimaginable power who rules through silence and fear. The final challenge of the Abyssal Court.
